participant_1.background:
I am going on a cruise next month.
My brother is currently couch surfing at my house.
I breed maine coon cats and show them.
My parents recently moved to florida.
I love to cook.

participant_2.background:
I have trouble feeling emotion.
I have an older brother that has gotten into trouble.
I see a therapist that doesn t really understand me.
Sometimes i wish i didn t have to wake up in the morning.

content.text: Hi there! I'm going on a cruise next month. What are you up to?
I'm not really sure. I have trouble feeling emotion.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have any family or friends that you can talk to?
Yes, I have an older brother, but he's gotten into trouble in the past.
I'm sorry to hear that. Do you see a therapist?
Yes, I do, but I don't think he really understands me.
I'm sorry to hear that. I know it's hard to find someone who really understands you.
Yeah, it is. Sometimes I wish I didn't have to wake up in the morning.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope things get better for you.
Thank you. I hope so too.
